definitions.definition: a plant or animal that has the same genes as the original from which it was produced
someone or something that looks very much like someone or something else:
examples: Most people saw her as just another blond-haired, red-lipped Marilyn Monroe clone.

definitions.definition: a computer that operates in a very similar way to the one that it was copied from
to create a clone of a plant or animal:
examples: Scientists have already cloned a sheep.
